Blog.post: Arlows...~so long neva write hor..hmmm..sat meet my pri sch fren..hahax..sho happi..cause she remember me..neva taut pple would remember another pri sch fren..especially after so long..hahax..then sundae follow casper and his ehem to plae bball..the east spring gals won though..hahax..after the match wen to meet another fren then went home..then at nite meet her again then go cut hair..then realise her sis my skool..hahax..then ytd 2 teachers neva come then 4 free period..then after skool go eat lunch at whitesands mc..then plae soccer liaox..so hot then sweat like bathing..haix..then todae so happi..for no reason though..hahax..nvm..signing off now..kk..bbx..miss her..:)

hmmm..todae earli morning go skool take mrt then 28..hahax..then wait wait in bus neva see her until goin out of bus tt tym..so happi..then during hist almost kena scolded 4 4getting to bring hw..but neva get..heng sia..after skool hang out wif rasydan,his gf and his gfs fren..so noisy sia her..hahax..then after tt follow long cai watch match softball match..our skool kena trash..hahax..usual lorx..but i have faith in them..after tt eat mcdonalds..then go home bath go out follow long cai fetch his slut..hahax..she juz come back from tuition mah..send her home then we go home lorx..tts abt it..hahax..kkx..g2g..bbx!

arlow!hmmm..todae was pretty exciting..early morning send hw to mr muhd..taut he scold but he neva lucky me though..then in class miss yong reject hw cause too short..hahax..art slack..casper n I run away from class..mr tan make so much noise..haix..then after skool kena caught by mr jailani..first dickson then me..then both of us went to catch lower secondary boys..hahax..we go eat seoulgarden wif shujuan,casper,dickson,michelle,jonus,zhi hao and guishan..hahax..casper treat me..tanx aniwaes dude..then watch movie..mean girls..beri good liaox..make me laugh until cough..hahax..quite dirty though the story..but overall can give 8/10 la..hmmm..feelin realli happi though..tts abt it..miss ya 4eva..nitex nitex

Hmm...hahax..have to write cause many pple say i neva update..hmmm..sat my com crash tanx to amsyar..make me restart gb so many times..haix..then ytd then reformat..hmmm..sat go plae pool..hahax win danny,nixin and ian but lose cai and casper..haix they good sia..nvm can train can train..ytd plae gb until 1+ then sleep ler..slacking again but happy though..todae after skool plae softball..my hand got 1 big blister then got the yucky thing inside..haix saturdae the door slam against my hand..i shout so loud..haix..now pain pain..then juz now had tuition wif naz and hanisah..tts abt it..kk..write again next time

Hmmm..the third time onli arx..hahax..nvm..haix..yesterdae was great..whole day was good except wen mrs looi scolded me and casper..played golf and tied casper hahax..so happi..then at nitex plae gb wif sock leng until arnd 12+ then sleep..then todae so sickening..my mother need to see mdm wong..sux man..then got detention...so boring..late 1 min stay there 1 hour..so idiotic sia..haix kk g2g now..write again next time

Haiz..todae muz go back to skool ler..ytd beri fun norx..go out wif zy,marinne,wenhui and jessie..go plaza singapura..then go to cineleisure(dunno how to spell)..hahax..plae arcade there..then wanted to bowl but full..then after that we go home..todae after skool stay in skool liaox..play soccer then basketball..i so lousy sia bb..haix..nvm..can train if i want..hahax..andi miss her so much..everyday i feel like seeing her face..nvm..miss ya always..bbx nehx

Haiz..wad abt todae..juz created this blog..todae is pretty tiring though..suppose to play pool but in the end dad dont allow..went to collect my specs at arnd 3 and discovered i was talkin to a hacker the next hour..haiz..he sent me a file which i dumber accept it..tts too bad though..tomolo goin to watch my fren ian at national stadium for youth day..signing off now..Have A Nice Day:P

Arlow..wahhhh..so long neva write de..nvm..now muz write long one..juz came back from holidae at malaysia..we stayed by the beach in a chalet..beri nice..then onli go wif my cousins family and ours..quite fun..in the car for 10 hours..beri long hor..cause my dad sometimes slow and fast..then wen reach onli..i straight away went swimming by the beach..then the wave so strong make 2 earstick drop..then went to town to find buy dont have transparent one..haix..then now close..sad sad.:(..but nvm..make no diff to me..cause wif it i am in fear..dunno why..hahax..then on the second dae..wake up to see sunrise..so nice man..then went for a swim..then saw 3 huge jellyfish and went to catch 1 of them using a stick..then so angry cause finger beri pain then took the stick and smashed the jellyfish..all the jelly came out..so disgusting man..my cousin all scared got poison..hahax..then oso caught sea anemone and sea urchin..so fun..play volleyball and soccer by the beach too..wen bath so difficult cause muz wash all the sand..but fun though..then when goin back that time..dad and my uncle heard ghosts noises..dunno how to describe..cause the place we passing was a chinese cemetry so scary man..then my father first was sleepy then after that awake ready cause scared..ahaha..then todae go out then fren got problem..then wait so long juz for them to get a solution..then in the end settle onli by shaking hands..so lame..waste my time..haix..but nvm..fun weekend..write again next time..

Arlow..haix..sori long tym no write..many pple sae..then i have to write..1 and a half week com was down..tanx to some dumb virus..haix..then..juz call the man fix ytd..saturdae..after np..went out wif casper,michelle and dickson..go beach road..then go play pool at golden mile..then go bugis eat..then plae pool again wif cai they all..glad i improve..though some tyco ones..hahax..then sundae..go out wif a fren from prs and her fren..then muz send both home..hahax..but nvm..then ytd also beri tiring..cause the man fix com till 12+..then still got virus..but the com at least can on..better then ntg..todae..so scary..sae wrong thing to eugene..i assume wrongly..then he find yw..haix..i reall sori though..todae bad dae liaox..ok..tts all..bb..miss ya dar dar
